channel.title: I cant make myself a frigging admin

item.title: I cant make myself a frigging admin
item.dc:creator: @zezi111 zezi111
item.description:
@zezi111 wrote:

Go to your chracter folder and you should see a list of players. Click the player you want to make mod or admin and you should see Character rights= 0’. Change the 0 to a 1 to make person mod, change the 0 to a 2 to make person admin, change the 0 to a 3 to make person owner. Then compile.

Read full topic

item.title: I cant make myself a frigging admin
item.dc:creator: @codyganzell codyganzell
item.description:
@codyganzell wrote:

you go to characters and then you find the username of the character you want to make admin you should see this

[CHARACTER]
character-height = 0
character-posx = 3212
character-posy = 3434
character-rights = 0
character-ismember = 1
character-messages = 0
character-lastconnection = 68.208.30.51
character-lastlogin = 20070431
character-energy = 58
character-gametime = 0
character-gamecount = 9156

just change character rights to 3 for owner 2 for admin and 1 for mod…if that dont work then idk

Read full topic
